items.question: Will there ever be another series filmed in the future?
items.answer: Yes, it's on the Wikipedia page and on Variety's page.May 16, 2022 5:11am PT 'Black Mirror' Returns: New Series in the Works at Netflix (EXCLUSIVE) By Manori Ravindran

items.question: What were the songs from the season 3 episode, "San Junipero"
items.answer: "Heaven Is a Place On Earth" Belinda Carlisle"Cest La Vie" Robbie Nevil"Walk like an Egyptian" Bangles"Fake" Alexander ONeal"Girlfriend In A Coma" The Smiths"Dont You (Forget About Me)" Simple Minds"Heart And Soul" TPau"Addicted to Love" Robert Palmer"Wishing Well" Terence Trent DArby"Living In A Box" Living In A Box"Need You Tonight" INXS"Lean On Me" Club Nouveau"Funkytown" Lipps Inc."Ironic" Alanis Morissette"Cant Get You Out Of My Head" Kylie Minogue
